modName: Petes117 Realistic Lighting custom INI file
summary: For use with \'Realistic Lighting with Customization v3.4\' (and 3.31)
descriptionHtml:
This my custom INI configuration for  Realistic Lighting with customization version 3.4 or if you prefer the previous 3.31

Important: make sure \'Realistic Lighting Patcher\' is BELOW \'Realistic Lighting\' in the Data Files list in the game\'s Launcher. This caught me out for a while!

My preferences for this mod, in comparison to default RL are:
Slightly darkened sky overall
Fast eye adapt
Subtle bloom for a cinematic effect
Slight DoF effect overall for a cinematic effect
Increased saturation overall for a more dynamic style
Nights: decreased saturation, increased contrast to make nights darker, increased DoF to make distant landmarks difficult to see
Daytime: less brightness, contrast, saturation. extra sunlight
Dawn/Dusk: extra saturation and redness for a dynamic sunrise/sunset
Interiors/Dungeons: increased skylight to show volume lighting

Requires:
Realistic Lighting mod with customisation v3.4 or 3.31 (select appropriate INI)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7654

Special Thanks:
Plutoman101 for making and supporting his awesome lighting mod!
Sydney666 for the 3.4 update!

Other mods I used to get those screenshots (1024x1024 versions where available):
Dramatic clouds
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4910

RWT Realistic Water Textures
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=711

Serious HD Retexture Landscape
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2146

Skyrim HD  - 2K Textures (install first so other mods overwrite) 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=607

Skyrim Flora Overhaul
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=141

More Rain/Deeper Snow
On the Steam Workshop 

The official HD texture DLC
Uncheck the two \"Highrestexturepack\" options in the launcher and change this line in your Skyrim.INI:
[Archive]
sResourceArchiveList=Skyrim - Misc.bsa, Skyrim - Shaders.bsa, Skyrim - Textures.bsa, Skyrim - Interface.bsa, Skyrim - Animations.bsa, Skyrim - Meshes.bsa, Skyrim - Sounds.bsa, HighResTexturePack01.bsa, HighResTexturePack02.bsa
author: Petes117
